name: Bagman Comes Back
overview: From the developer of Lady Pac, comes Bagman Comes Back, a game inspired by the 1982 Valadon Automation arcade classic, Bagman. This version is made up of 8 completely new stages. The game works perfectly on both PAL and NTSC models. However, for game speeds similar to the original arcade game, it is suggested using a NTSC C64, or an emulator running in NTSC mode.
